data.prayer: Father, we ask for 329 new simple churches in the county of Nandurbar, Maharashtra, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,648,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nandurbar, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Nandurbar.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Nandurbar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Nandurbar, Maharashtra, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bhil Dubla people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, help the church in the county of Nandurbar to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, teach the 18,131 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, help the 18,131 believers in Nandurbar to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

location.name: Nandurbar
location.people_groups_list: Badhai Gandhar, Panar, Brahma Kshatriya, Chaudhari, tribal, Vaghri (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Badhai Gandhar (28,000), Panar (1,800), Brahma Kshatriya (25,000), Chaudhari, tribal (302,000), Vaghri (Muslim traditions) (22,000)
